scenario_description: Relationship manager prepares for a high-value customer meeting by retrieving customer insights, generating personalized recommendations, and receiving real-time alerts about relationship health.
expected_outcome: RM receives comprehensive customer brief with personalized recommendations and real-time alerts

2025_pattern_alignment: Self-Reflective RAG with hybrid search (dense+sparse) for customer insights. Agentic AI (PT-007) for autonomous brief generation. Feature Store (PT-003) for real-time customer features.

scenario_description: Finance team processes month-end close by accessing data products, generating P&L narratives, detecting anomalies, and producing automated reports with visualizations.

scenario_description: Business analyst asks a natural language question about sales trends, receives SQL-generated results, predictive forecasts, and auto-generated insights.
expected_outcome: Query results with predictive insights and auto-generated narrative explanation displayed

scenario_description: Credit officer processes a loan application through ML scoring, alternative data enrichment, explainable AI decisions, and generates compliance narratives.
expected_outcome: Credit decision made with full explainability and compliance documentation generated
components_exercised: Credit Decision Interface,ML Model Serving,Risk Models,Score Calculation,Data Enrichment,External Data Sources,Analytics Platform,LLM API,XAI Framework,Model Interpretation,ML Ensemble Framework,Model Combination,Risk Aggregation,Credit Templates,Document Generation,Compliance Reporting,Stream Processing,Event Processing,Real-time Analytics
2025_pattern_alignment: MANDATORY: Real-Time Scoring (PT-009) <1s latency. MANDATORY Explainability (PT-004) with SHAP/LIME. Feature Store (PT-003) for credit features. MLOps Level 2+ (PT-002) for drift detection.

scenario_description: Lending operations processes incoming loan documents through OCR extraction, NLP classification, validation, summarization, and exception handling workflow.
expected_outcome: Documents processed, validated, and routed for approval or exception handling

scenario_description: Customer receives a hyper-personalized offer through real-time decisioning, ML recommendations, A/B testing optimization, and multi-channel journey orchestration.

scenario_description: Contact center agent handles customer inquiry with AI-assisted context retrieval, real-time suggestions, sentiment analysis, and automated call summarization.

2025_pattern_alignment: Conversational AI (PT-013) with multi-turn dialogue. Self-Reflective RAG (PT-005) for knowledge retrieval. Multi-Model Routing (PT-006) for speech/text/sentiment models.

scenario_description: Security operations center detects and responds to potential threat using AI-powered SIEM correlation, automated playbook execution, and incident management.
expected_outcome: Threat contained with automated response and incident documented

2025_pattern_alignment: Real-Time Scoring (PT-009) <100ms threat detection. Event-Driven (PT-015) + Stream Processing (PT-016) for monitoring. UEBA with behavioral baselines. Security observability (PT-017).

scenario_description: Data team publishes a new data product with automated quality checks, lineage tracking, metadata generation, and consumer discoverability.
